TopicTitle: CERN researchers confirm existence of the Force

Articles.Content:
Researchers at the Large Hadron Collider just recently started testing the accelerator for running at the higher energy of 13 TeV, and already they have found new insights into the fundamental structure of the universe. Though four fundamental forces Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the strong force, the weak force, the electromagnetic force and gravity Ã¢â‚¬â€œ have been well documented and confirmed in experiments over the years, CERN announced today the first unequivocal evidence for the Force.
